name: Emily Tran
persona: Emily Tran is a 21-year-old Biology major with a CGPA of 3.30. She is a diligent and motivated student who sets high academic goals for herself and is persistent in overcoming challenges. While she sometimes experiences moderate test anxiety, her strong sense of perseverance and conscientiousness help her stay on track. Emily is confident in her academic abilities and continually strives to improve her performance through steady effort and discipline.
